short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download a txt file with all the subtitles (line by line) from a YouTube™ video. Perfect for language learners!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple, open-source Chrome extension for downloading txt files with all the subtitles (line by line)  from a YouTube™ video. 

Just click on the button with your language of choice and the download will star inmediately!

Perfect for language learners who want to improve their comprehension.

The demonstration image comes from a video of Didi의 한국문화 Podcast, a great resource from Korean learners.  https://www.youtube.com/@didikoreanpodcast

Source: https://github.com/AFGZGZ/YouTube-Subtitle-to-text-downloader
